channel.title: How do I add Bando's items to my server?
channel.description: Okay I have Silabs, but the server I am usingjust dosent comewith Bando's how do I add Bando's Chestplate ect...? Like can someone send me a tut? :confused:

item.title: How do I add Bando's items to my server?

item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

an you please find me the bando’s chest and legs code?

item.title: How do I add Bando's items to my server?
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Go to item.cfg and copy the last code then change the id, price,bonuses etc to bandos whatever items

Go to item4.java and put the items in the right spot. After that just spawn or add into shops via shops.cfg

Read full topic
